regen.absent_element: recovery aspect of disaster recovery capabilities
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide disaster recovery capabilities that include the recovery of data from backups, ensuring full restoration in the event of data loss.

regen.absent_element: the recovery actions in disaster recovery processes
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide procedures for restoring data from backups to ensure complete recovery in case of data loss.

regen.absent_element: handling and corrective actions following error detection
regen.new_specification: The system shall execute corrective measures and send alerts to administrators when errors are detected during Archival Storage transfers to ensure timely recovery actions.

label: disaster recovery capabilities including data recovery
